channel.title: Really annoying error

item.title: Really annoying error
item.dc:creator: @Xero1 Xero`
item.description:
@Xero1 wrote:

i was trying to fix godswords anim so i added
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15334

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15333 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335)//Godsword
{
return 2927;
}

and i get

public int GetRunAnim()
^ illegal start of an expression
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2008, 06:38:50 PM[/size][hr]I really need help here
